name: Treasure Fleet: Galleon
text:
2+ Level 6 Explorer monsters
This card gains the ATK and DEF of all materials attached to it. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; negate its effects, and if you do, attach it to this card as an Xyz material. Once per turn (Quick Effect): if your opponent activates a Spell/Trap effect you can detach 1 Xyz material from this card; negate the activation, and if you do, add 1 "Treasure" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
